trans-unit.source: Sports law is an umbrella term used to describe the legal issues at work in the world of both amateur and professional sports.
trans-unit.target: Sports law is an umbrella term used to describe the legal issues at work in the world of both amateur and professional sports.

trans-unit.source: Sports law overlaps substantially with labor law, contract law, competition or antitrust law, and tort law.
trans-unit.target: Sports law overlaps substantially with labor law, contract law, competition or antitrust law, and tort law.
